channel.title: Josh Duhamel on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Josh Duhamel on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Josh Duhamel on ‘Trying to Be Jason Statham’ in ‘London Calling,’ Having to Shoot His Next Movie Out of Los Angeles and ‘Ransom Canyon’ Season 2
item.description: When Josh Duhamel initially pops up on screen in Allan Unger’s new action comedy “London Calling,” he’s barely recognizable. The perennially good-looking leading man went bald for his first few scenes

item.title: Canada to End Foreign Actor Eligibility for 2026 Screen Awards
item.description: The Canadian Academy supporting homegrown talent and productions with rulebook changes comes amid U.S.-Canada tensions, including from U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariff and annexation threats.
